## IU Course Description

STAT-S 100 Statistical Literacy (3 cr.) **CASE N&M** P: MATH-M 014 or equivalent. How to be an informed consumer of statistical analysis. Experiments and observational studies, summarizing and displaying data, relationships between variables, quantifying uncertainty, drawing statistical inferences.
